main event: A witness observed a bright object in the night sky over Dayton, Ohio on February 7, 1954.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2-30 minutes and its motion was described as definite.
The witness reported that the object was visible continuously during the sighting.
The sky conditions were described as night, with a cloudy sky.
The witness did not provide any details about the shape, size, or behavior of the object.
No other witnesses are mentioned, and no photographs were taken.
sighted object: a bright object in the night sky
